page.title: 17The Parish Hall, Littleworth
page.content: The hall was built in the year of the Queens Silver Jubilee in 1977 and the money was provided by the selling of a piece of land by the council. It is a large detached building made of wood and painted dark brown.Outside the hall there is a private playing field with swings for the children. Every Monay evening the Guides meet in the hall and every Tuesdau evening the Badmington Club is held there. The Womens Institute meet monthly, as do thewomens Club and the Horticultural Society. Mothers and Toddlers are also catered for and meet on Tuesday morning. The children are aged up to three years old. It is an important social meeting place for the village.
